article_metadata.article_headline: 'It's just madness' - Dyche perplexed by Everton defending
article_metadata.article_text: Everton manager Sean Dyche says his side's defending for Manchester United's third goal was "madness" in their 4-0 loss at Old Trafford.

quotes.raw_quote_text: [In reference to Manchester United's third goal] Our defending was "madness".
quotes.summary: I described our defending as madness.
quotes.invalid_reason: The raw quote text includes context in brackets which is not considered helpful or part of the actual spoken words.

Latest updates
--------------

1. **Atmosphere speaks for itself** - Amorim restores feel-good factor.
    
    Manchester United's win over Everton at Old Trafford under Ruben Amorim is the biggest margin of victory for a permanent manager in their first home match in the competition for the club.
    
    **On the game:** "It was far from a perfect performance. We have to improve, you can feel that in the game."
    
    **On their opening goal:** "You have to congratulate the players and the rest of the staff. The most important thing on set pieces is the staff."
    
    **On Amad Diallo:** "He is really big in talent, but small in size. He did a great job but he also has to improve."
    
    **On the mood becoming more buoyant and optimistic:** "It helps to have a new face, it always helps. Our fans just ask for hard work and then, in time, they will ask for better football." 

2. **Marcus Rashford**: "We all, as individuals, want to get back to our best and then push to improve so even in the bad moments, you are doing the right thing."
    
3. **Ruben Amorim**: "It was a really good result and a tough match."

quotes.raw_quote_text: [On the game] "It was far from a perfect performance. We have to improve, you can feel that in the game."
quotes.summary: It wasn't a perfect performance; we need to improve.

quotes.raw_quote_text: [On their opening goal] "You have to congratulate the players and the rest of the staff. The most important thing on set pieces is the staff."
quotes.summary: We should commend the players and staff for the set pieces.

quotes.raw_quote_text: [On Amad Diallo] "He is really big in talent, but small in size. He did a great job but he also has to improve."
quotes.summary: Amad has great talent despite his size, but he needs to improve.

quotes.raw_quote_text: [On the mood] "It helps to have a new face, it always helps. Our fans just ask for hard work and then, in time, they will ask for better football."
quotes.summary: A new face boosts the mood; fans want hard work before better football.

quotes.raw_quote_text: "We all, as individuals, want to get back to our best and then push to improve so even in the bad moments, you are doing the right thing."
quotes.summary: We all aim to improve and do the right thing, even during tough times.

quotes.raw_quote_text: "It was a really good result and a tough match."
quotes.summary: The match was tough, but we achieved a great result.
